modName: Khajiit leopard body texture for UNP BASE body
summary: Khajiit Leopard body texture conversion from CBBE to UNP
descriptionHtml:
So this is basically a mod conversion from CBBE to UNP body, the mod originally was created by Utruiwe, I really loved his work, but I dont really like CBBE body, I think UNP is superior in many ways. I took over his attempt to convert his texture to UNP and succeeded.
Here is a link to Utruiwe\\\'s Khajiit body texture for CBBE
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7690


Have in mind that this mod is only a pack of body textures for UNP BASE body mod, so you will need to download that first, if you havent got it already.
Here it is
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709

I also strongly recommend that you download Coverkhajiit mod as well, iit is just amazing, thanks MrLenski!
Coverkhajiit mod
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5941

You can use the texture in your mods freely, just mention me in credits :D
author: Nerevar22g

files.name: Khajiit leopard body texture for UNP BASE body
